alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Camden County through 415 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Waverly, or near Woodbine, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dover Bluff and Harrietts Bluff. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
